controller.hrs

Interface ReservationInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReservationController

    public interface ReservationInterface
    ReservationInterface is an interface representing a generic contract for all implementing classes to expose method(s) to handle reservation logic.
    Author:
    YingHao

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean cancelReservation(View view)
      Prompts the user to enter relevant information to cancel a reservation.
      Reservation makeReservation(View view)
      Prompts the user to enter relevant information to make a reservation.
      Reservation makeReservation(View view, Guest guest)
      Prompts the user to enter relevant information to make a reservation for the specified guest.
      boolean reserveRoomForReservation(Reservation reservation)
      Reserves a room for the specified Reservation.
      void searchReservation(View view)
      Prompts the user to enter relevant information to search for a reservation.
